GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article corresponding to path article_id

article.title: Another article about Mitch

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, default sort by created_at

articles.author: butter_bridge
articles.title: Another article about Mitch
articles.body: There will never be enough articles about Mitch!

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments corresponding to path article_id

comments.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a username of all users

POST /api/articles.description: POSTs an article to the articles table and serves the corresponding POSTed article
